ja386:5.2: vastaṃ → bhastaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kalakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | garaṃ (mr)
ja386:6.1: Tvaṃ khopi → tvaṃ nu kho (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | tvaṃ ca kho (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja386:7.1: Aparampi samma te bālyaṃ → ayampi samma te bālo (mr)
ja386:9.2: bhariyāya yo padassati → bhariyā yo padassati (pts-vp-pli1ed) | bhariyā na bhavissati (mr)
ja386:10.1: Na ve piyammeti → na piyammeti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | na piyameti (mr) | na piyamedanti (katthaci)
